1.title: Dirty Hairy Dog Wash
1.plot: In the premiere episode, a dog wash owner explains how she got started with her business and how her passion for animals and a greener environment inspires her to continue providing the service to the Greater Houston area.

2.title: It's Reynin' Cakes
2.plot: A young entrepreneur in the culinary arts industry talks about the business she started, how family and bright smiling faces keep her motivated, and where she sees her business going in the future.

3.title: Metro Marketing & Design
3.plot: Friends since grade school, Katie and Mila decided to start a business together during their final year in college. The duo talks about how they went into the business blindfolded, and how they've come out at the top of their game.

4.title: Diedra Lizcano Art
4.plot: Houston-based artist Diedra Lizcano talks about how she got started in the industry, road blocks along the way, goals and dreams, her debut art show, and insight for aspiring young artists.

imdb.plot outline: Heart of a Passion is a series that showcases the adoration small business owners and entrepreneurs have for what they do. Many businesses lose their personal touch once they become successful and are raking in tons of money. Our goal is to remind our viewing audience that whether you shine shoes or develop advanced software, what really makes the business worth it is the passion and heart you have for your art.
imdb.title: Heart of a Passion
plot: _Heart of a Passion_ (qv) is a series that showcases the adoration small business owners and entrepreneurs have for what they do. Many businesses lose their personal touch once they become successful and are raking in tons of money. Our goal is to remind our viewing audience that whether you shine shoes or develop advanced software, what really makes the business worth it is the passion and heart you have for your art.::El X. Love
